Name: Scourgefire Axe - Battle Axe
Description: Close-range weapon, giving the warrior an indomitable fighting spirit, with an Ultimate that can enter an enhanced state, bursting out incredible energy in a short time, destroying everything in its path, and exuding a formidable aura.
Description$english: Close-range weapon, giving the warrior an indomitable fighting spirit, with an Ultimate that can enter an enhanced state, bursting out incredible energy in a short time, destroying everything in its path, and exuding a formidable aura.
